name: AD-99
description:
DISCLAIMER - This game was created on a framework provided by Staffordshire university. Models/textures + character and shield mechanics were provided. 

Ad-99 is a project created for my studies at Staffordshire university to help build up my unreal skills by creating a level from a framework. I created designs for the level to build an interesting and fun level design which was accompanied by mechanics created by me such as the moving platforms, doors, turrets, and kill walls

Alongside this, I also experimented with creating unique and pretty environments using colour and external software such as SpaceScape for the skybox

This project alongside Impending mystery gave me first-class honors in the 3-D Engines module at 86%

The design document that highlights all of this is included in the game

WASD = Movement 

Space = Jump

Left Click = Hit/interact

Right Click = Shield
